Straightshot covers them gently with a bed of nesting material, to keep the=
 babies warm.

" Great job Uproar, they'll sleep for a few hours now.  But =
they're gonna need more food when they wake up."

Uproar nods.

" No proble=
m, I'll just go back ta the water and get another fish.  Or maybe find some=
thing else..  I did notice a surplus of wild Hogs running around, dozens of=
 Em .  I think it's okay if I snag one once in a while.  Actually, this is =
when they feed so I better go out there now and get one."

He trots off to =
bring more food back for Talon and the babies.
Straightshot waves to him.

=
" Aw, he's really into helping you, Talon.  Look how big that fish was.  I =
bet he really worked hard ta bring it here.   I'm telling Tucson that Uncle=
 Uproar is doing a fantastic job as food finder.  There, the babies are asl=
eep now.  Hopefully Tucson will be back with the others shortly."

Local ar=
tist who specializes in illustration, using traditional and digital media. =
 

I also specialize in hand made crafts.  Great for any occasion!  

Need =
a great gift idea that is original?  No problem!  Email me at this address =
and we will talk.
